about_the_game: This is Demo, and it has around 30 minutes of gameplay. Action adventure game. Play as Inna, Daughter of the Void and discover this magic world. Try many different magic spells and face unique enemies on your path. Interesting 2d hand drawn world, and unique style make it worth your time.
detailed_description: This is Demo, and it has around 30 minutes of gameplay. Action adventure game. Play as Inna, Daughter of the Void and discover this magic world. Try many different magic spells and face unique enemies on your path. Interesting 2d hand drawn world, and unique style make it worth your time.
